Summary: Large orange ball near Fort Mtn, GA.
divs: Sighting DetailsA business owner saw a light through his bedroom window, described as ayellow-orange sphere with an apparent size of a basketball at arms length,hovering near Fort Mountain about 1 mile distant. As he watched, the ball begandrifting left to right, contracted to the size of a baseball or softball andback to basketball size, then vanished. Duration of the sighting was 5 to 6seconds.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chatsworth
There were no other sightings in Chatsworth on or around October 16th 1999
